_description: Robin Hood and the Sheriff of Nottingham: fragment of a drama — 42 lines in couplets

CamTCCR264.First Lines:
Syr sheryffe for thy sakeRobyn hod wull y takeI wyll the gyffe
                    and feeThis be heste þu holde me…
CamTCCR264.Last Lines:
…Opy[n] the yatis laste anonAnd [ ]e thow thovys ynne
                    good…
CamTCCR264.Note:
Single leaf with verse text on recto only; receipt on reverse;
                        19th-century transcript by Stukeley ed. bad key,
                    321-2; 19th-century transcript by Bradshaw ed. Child (1857)

         5 vols. in 10 parts. Boston and New York: Houghton, Mifflin,
            1882-98, 3.90; Manly (1897)
XManly,  John Matthews. 
             Specimens of the Pre-Shakspearean Drama.
         2 vols. Boston: Ginn, 1897, 1.279-81.
